# desiredGains

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of desiredGains is to provide a framework for the exploration of effects of complex selection indices.

## Installation

You can install the development version of desiredGains from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("johannesgeibel/desiredGains")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(desiredGains)
## to be done
```

Read the vignette `CaseStudy` for a detailed introduction.

```{r vignette}
vignette("CaseStudy", package = "desiredGains")
```
